description: TEHRAN - CD Castellón club have agreed to sign Iranian goalkeeper Amir Abedzadeh
title: Persepolis target Abedzadeh joins Castellón

description: TEHRAN - Moroccan defender Ayoub El Amloud joined Persian Gulf Pro League champions Persepolis on Tuesday.
title: Persepolis complete signing of Ayoub El Amloud

description: TEHRAN - Iran beat Kuwait 25-23 in the 18th Asian Men Junior Handball Championship on Tuesday.
title: Iran victorious over Kuwait at Asian Junior Handball Championship

description: TEHRAN – Iran has strongly denounced a tragic shooting attack near a mosque in Oman's Wadi al-Kabir area, Muscat Governorate, during a Shia Muslim ceremony commemorating Ashura, the annual remembrance of the martyrdom of Imam Hossein, the third Shia Imam and grandson of Prophet Mohammad (pbuh).
title: Iran condemns deadly shooting incident in Oman

description: TEHRAN - During a visit to Khuzestan, the acting president expressed appreciation for the effective efforts of engineers and staff at the Ramin power plant in Ahwaz in preventing power outages.
title: Ramin power plant engineers rewarded for remarkable achievements

description: TEHRAN – Iran's acting Foreign Minister Ali Baqeri Kani has emphasized the urgent need for international efforts to stop Israel's genocidal campaign against Gaza.
title: Tehran urges action to halt Israeli genocidal crimes against Gaza

description: TEHRAN – China has expressed its appreciation for the recently declared positive outlook on Sino-Iranian relations by Iran's president-elect, Masoud Pezeshkian, and affirmed its readiness to collaborate with the new administration of the Islamic Republic.
title: China welcomes Iranian president-elect’s positive outlook on bilateral relations

description: TEHRAN - The Ambassador of the Islamic Republic of Iran to Turkey engaged in discussions with the deputy minister of Justice of the Republic of Turkey to enhance bilateral judicial cooperation.
title: Iran's ambassador holds talks with Turkish deputy minister of Justice

description: TEHRAN - On Ashura day, the flag of the dome of Imam Hussein's shrine was presented to President-elect Masoud Pezeshkian.
title: President-elect honored with flag from Imam Hussein's Shrine

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Ministry Spokesman Nasser Kanaani has called on Muslims worldwide to remember and support the Palestinian people on Ashura Day.
title: Spokesman urges remembering Palestinians on Ashura day

description: TEHRAN - The head of the Transition Council for the fourteenth government disclosed the process of reviewing and suggesting members for the new government.
title: Selection process of new cabinet members underway: Zarif

description: TEHRAN- Members of the workers community and representatives from the retirement association convened to discuss their financial demands and concerns in a meeting with the newly elected president.
title: Pezeshkian holds meetings with workers and retirees’ representatives

description: TEHRAN – The European Union has prolonged its sanctions against Iran for another year, citing Iran's alleged military support for Russia in the Ukraine conflict and its backing of resistance groups in West Asia.
title: EU extends anti-Iran sanctions for another year

description: TEHRAN – In an interview with Newsweek on Tuesday, acting Iranian Foreign Minister Ali Baqeri Kani asserted that Israel is losing its battle against the Axis of Resistance in West Asia.
title: Iran acting FM asserts Israel is losing war in West Asia

description: TEHRAN – The past 50 days have been a remarkable period for Iran, marked by significant challenges and triumphant successes.
title: Transition period like never before

description: TEHRAN – Azerbaijan has announced the reopening of its embassy in Iran following over a year of successful negotiations aimed at easing tensions between the two neighboring countries.
title: Azerbaijan reopens embassy in Tehran

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the book “Soft Skills for Kids: In Schools, at Home, and Online” written by Nancy Armstrong Melser has been released in the bookstores across Iran.
title: “Soft Skills for Kids” published in Persian

description: TEHRAN-Four short films from Iran will participate in the 47th Asian American International Film Festival (AAIFF) in Manhattan, New York, the U.S., due to be held from August 1 to 11.
title: 4 Iranian short films to compete in 47th Asian American Intl. Film Festival in Manhattan

description: TEHRAN- The grand outdoor play "More Alone than Christ" will be performed at Velayat Park in Tehran on Thursday.
title: Outdoor play explores unseen aspect of Ashura

description: TEHRAN- To mark the month of Muharram and the mourning ceremonies for the martyrdom of Imam Hussein (AS), tazieh performances about the martyrdom of Ali al-Akbar (AS), the son of Imam Hussein (AS), were held at the Al-Mahdi Center in Rome, Italy on Saturday and Sunday.
title: Rome hosts tazieh performances

description: TEHRAN- Israel has committed brutal massacres in the Gaza Strip since declaring war on the Palestinian territory more than nine months ago.
title: Israel's abhorrent use of Palestinians as human shields in the spotlight

description: Nine months have passed since the start of the relentless Israeli war against the Palestinians in Gaza, and the killing of defenseless Palestinian civilians and the destruction of their homes continues.
title: The Zionist entity is in a strategic impasse due to its failure to achieve its declared goals

description: TEHRAN- The Palestinian resistance fighters continue to attack the Israeli military, which is said to be displaying signs of fatigue and frustration.
title: Gaza resistance forces destroy Israeli tanks

description: Israeli air strikes have killed more than 60 Palestinians in southern and central Gaza, including one that hit an Israeli-declared “safe zone” crowded with thousands of displaced people.
title: Israel kills dozens of Palestinians in “safe zone”

description: Israeli hard-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich has called on Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to annex the West Bank should the International Court of Justice (ICJ) declare Israeli settlements illegal.
title: Smotrich demands West Bank annexation if ICJ declares settlements illegal

description: The United States and Israel have allowed tax-deductible donations to far-right groups that have blocked humanitarian aid from being delivered to the Gaza Strip.
title: Far-right groups that block aid to Gaza receive donations from US and Israel

description: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres expressed concern Monday over the ongoing situation in the Gaza Strip, saying "nowhere is safe" in the besieged enclave.
title: UN: Everywhere is a potential killing zone in Gaza

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered a halt to the recording of security consultations and cabinet discussions held in the underground operations center of military headquarters, Haaretz reported on Monday.
title: Netanyahu orders army to turn off recording of meetings after Oct. 7

description: Israeli opposition leader Yair Lapid has dismissed allegations of incitement against Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, saying every soldier fighting in Gaza is more threatened than him.
title: Lapid: Netanyahu is a coward

description: The Palestinian Hamas resistance movement has issued a statement denouncing Israel’s “deliberate bombing of displaced people in UNRWA’s al-Razi School in the Nuseirat camp, and the Al-Mawasi area west of the city of Khan Younis, which was declared a safe area”.
title: Hamas: Bombing of UNRWA school evidence of Israeli savagery

description: TEHRAN - In a meeting focused on deepening cultural ties, Indian Ambassador to Iran, Rudra Gaurav Shresth, lauded Iran as the world’s oldest civilization and proposed several initiatives to enhance cultural cooperation between the two nations.
title: Indian ambassador honors Iran’s ancient legacy, proposes richer cultural bonds

description: TEHRAN - Excavations have begun at Digvar Tepe in Ardabil province’s Germi following the discovery of an ancient brick structure during illegal digging, a local official announced.
title: Excavations begin at Digvar Tepe after ancient structure found

description: MINSK – On July 7, as the sun was setting, a tall and thin young man was waiting for me from Iran and another journalist from Kazakhstan at Minsk airport. He said I welcome you to Belarus on behalf of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
title: Belarus is a hidden gem

description: TEHRAN- The National Museum of Iran has unveiled the exhibition, “Alam and Tuq: Symbols and Allegory of Muharram,” in honor of the Imam Hussain (AS), the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH), which was martyred on the tenth day of the lunar month in 680 CE.
title: Special Exhibition at National Museum celebrates Muharram symbols

description: TEHRAN - Mashal Gardani, or the “rolling of the torch,” is an annual religious event deeply embedded in the cultural and spiritual fabric of parts of Iran and Iraq. This profound ritual is one of the many shared heritages between the two nations, reflecting the enduring legacy of their historical and religious ties.
title: Flames of faith: the enduring Muharram ritual of Mashal Gardani

description: TEHRAN- As announced by the director general of the Iranian Ministry of Agriculture’s Office of Quality Improvement, Processing, and Aquatic Market, the value of Iran’s caviar export increased by over 41 percent during the first quarter of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-June 20), as compared to the same period of time in the past year.
title: Caviar export up 41% in a quarter on year

description: TEHRAN - July 14, 2017, was an especially sad day for Iranians around the world. On that day, Iranian-American genius mathematician Maryam Mirzakhani died of cancer when she was only 40.
title: In memory of Maryam Mirzakhani: an exceptional gift for mathematics

description: TEHRAN –Iranian students have succeeded in winning two gold medals and two silver medals at the 35th edition of the International Biology Olympiad (IBO) held in Astana, Kazakhstan, from July 7 to 14.
title: Iran shines at International Biology Olympiad 2024

description: TEHRAN –A national network is planned to be launched with the aim of empowering elite women and female technologists in the country.
title: National network for elite women, female technologists to be launched

description: TEHRAN – Shiraz University and St. Petersburg University have signed 12 memorandums of understanding (MOUs) to boost cultural, educational, and research collaborations.
title: Iranian, Russian universities ink 12 MOUs

description: TEHRAN – The director general of the Iranian Industry, Mining and Trade Ministry’s Office of Food and Drug Industries has said the ministry has revived 318 idle production units active in the pharmaceutical and food sectors in the previous Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19).
title: 318 idle pharmaceutical, food production units revived in a year

description: TEHRAN - The capacity of Iran's renewable power plants has reached 1,199.71 megawatts (MW), based on the latest data released by Iran's Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency Organization (SATBA).
title: Capacity of Iran’s renewable power plants touches 1,200 MW

description: TEHRAN - Head of National Iranian Oil Refining and Distribution Company (NIORDC) Jalil Salari said following the implementation of the Oil Ministry’s recent consumption management programs, fuel consumption in the country is expected to be reduced by 10 percent by the end of the current Iranian year (late March 2025), Shana reported.
title: Fuel consumption expected to fall 10% by late Mar. 2025

description: TEHRAN – Iran exported about $1.027 billion of agricultural products in the first three months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-June 21), registering an increase of 37 percent year on year.
title: Iran's quarterly export of agricultural products up 37% yr/yr
